Translations.Text: Amara ki apanara baksa apanara kalyane prasasta kare de'ini
Ara amara apasarana karechi apanara bhara
ya apanara pitha bhenge dicchila
Ara amara apanara (maryada brd'dhira) jan'ya apanara smaranake samunnata karechi
Sutaram kastera sathe'i to sbasti ache
niscaya kastera sathe'i sbasti ache
Ata'eba apani yakhana'i abasara pana takhana'i kathora ibadate rata hona
ara apanara rabera prati gabhira manoyogi hona
Sapatha ‘tina’ o ‘yayatuna” [1] – era
sapatha ‘ture sinina’ [1]-era
sapatha e'i nirapada nagarira
abasya'i amara srsti karechi manusake sundaratama gathane
tarapara amara take hinatagrastadera hinatame parinata kari –
kintu taderake naya yara imana eneche ebam satkarma kareche; edera jan'ya to ache nirabacchinna puraskara
Kaje'i (he manusa!) Erapara kise tomake karmaphala dina samparke abisbasi kare
allah ki bicarakadera madhye sarbasrestha bicaraka nana
paruna apanara rabera name, yini srsti karechena [1] –
srsti karechena manusake ‘alaka’ hate
Paruna, ara apanara raba mahamahimanbita
yini kalamera sahayye siksa diyechena [1] –
siksa diyechena manusake ya se janata na
Bastabe'i [1], manusa simalanghana'i kare thake
karana se nijake amukhapeksi mane kare
Niscaya apanara rabera kache'i phire ya'oya
Amake jana'o (ebam ascarya ha'o) tara samparke, ye badha deya
eka bandake [1]- yakhana tini salata adaya karena
Amake bala! Yadi tini hidayatera upara thakena
athaba takoyara nirdesa dena; (tarapara'o se kibhabe badha deya)
amake bala! Yadi se (nisedhakari) mithyaropa kare ebam mukha phiriye neya
se ki jane na ye, niscaya allah dekhena
kakhano naya, se yadi birata na haya tabe amara take abasya'i hemcare niye yaba, mathara samanera culera guccha dhare
mithyacari, papistha sam'mukha-culera-guccha
Ata'eba se tara parisadake deke anuka
sighra'i amara deke anaba yabaniyaderake
Kakhano naya! Apani tara anusarana karabena na. Ara apani sajda karuna ebam nikatabarti hona
Niscaya amara kura'ana nayila karechi [1] ‘la'ilatula kadare’
ara apanake kise janabe ‘la'ilatula-kadara’ ki
‘la'ilatula-kadara’ hajara masera ceye srestha
Se rate phiristagana o ruh nayila haya [1] tadera rabera anumatikrame sakala sid'dhanta [2] niye
Santimaya [1] se rata, phajarera abirbhaba paryanta
Ahale kitabadera madhye yara kuphari kareche ebam musarikara [1], tara nibrtta habe na yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana asabe [2]—
allahara kacha theke eka rasula, yini tela'oyata karena pabitra patrasamuha
yate ache sathika bidhibad'dha bidhana
Ara yaderake kitaba deya hayechila tara to bibhakta hala tadera kache suspasta pramana asara para
Ara taderake kebala e nirdesa'i pradana kara hayechila ye, tara yena allahara ibadata kare tamra'i jan'ya dinake ekanistha kare ebam salata kayema kare o yakata pradana kare. Ara eta'i sathika dina
Niscaya kitabidera madhye yara kuphari kareche tara ebam musarikara jahannamera agune sthayibhabe abasthana karabe; tara'i srstira adhama
Niscaya yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche, tara'i srstira sraestha

Tadera rabera kache ache tadera puraskara: Sthayi jannata, yara nice nadi prabahita, sekhane tara cirasthayi habe. Allah tadera prati santusta [1] ebam tara'o tamra prati sastusta. Eti tara jan'ya, ye tara rabake bhaya kare
Yakhana prabala kampane yamina prakampita kara habe
ara yamina tara bhara bera kare debe
ara manusa balabe, ‘era ki hala [1]?’
Sedina yamina tara brttanta barnana karabe
karana apanara raba take nirdesa diyechena
Sedina manusa bhinna bhinna dale bera habe [1], yate taderake tadera krtakarma dekhana yaya
ke'u anu parimana satkaja karale se ta dekhabe
Ara ke'u anu parimana asatkaja karale se ta'o dekhabe
Sapatha urdhbasbase dhabamana asbarajira
atahpara yara ksurera aghate agni-sphulinga bicchurita kare
atahpara yara abhiyana kare prabhatakale
phale tara ta dbara dhuli utksipta kare
atahpara ta dbara satru dalera abhyantare dhuke pare
Niscaya manusa tara rabera prati bara'i akrtajna
ara niscaya se e bisaye saksi
ara niscaya se dhana-sampadera asaktite prabala
